name: Angry Spider
description:
A big, angry spider has walked into a human town! The humans are trying to fight back! How long can you go before they take you down? And how many points will you get?

== Instructions ==

This is a highscore based arcade game.

- Move with WASD

- Click on-screen with the mouse to web around the map, over walls and bullets

Touching enemies in succession increases the combo counter

Remember: Scores are saved in the "Saves" folder inside the game's data folder. You can access and delete it from there!

== Credits ==

Programmed and designed by KaaSnake in Unity

Pixel-art made in GIMP

Sound Effects made in jsfxr

Music by KaaSnake made in Pico-8
